Amazing game with a basic concept yet fun in every way possible. I'd say in my opinion its really geared and fun to play with a set a friends if, you're playing as a survivor with a selection of good perks too chose from which you can unlock thru other characters reaching a certain level (30) which allows you to unlock a set a perks thru the (bloodweb) on the specified character. However solo queing a game on your own is really stressful and gives you frustration because of poor communication other than two sets of interactions with emote's such as (Pointing fingers in a direction) and (Hand signaling someone to come over to your spot for heals or exchange items that you can drop in game). Now to focus on the other part of this game which gives you the option to play as killer is a unique and fun experience of the game which allows you too get rough and aggressive against the survivors too stop them from fixing gens and escaping. There are a good set of killers too choose from once purchasing the game but in my opinion it gets boring after a while cycling thru the killers you've been playing since the game was purchased. Its better to purchase more intresting killers that you can read about before your purchase of the killer, also "dont worry this game will not break the bank you can purchase survivors/killers individually if you'd wish for a minimal of $5.00" or you can purchase the DLC which unlock the survivor and killer altogther. Too sum of up or point of some things I've missed

Pros:
-Addicting with friends
-Community is nice (in my experience) some players can get a little rough in the end game chat depending on the match
-You don't need a high end PC to run this game
-If you have a good set of headphones this game will be a plus+ for you

Cons:
-Solo queing
-Some toxicity such as
1. Helping the killer
2. Exposing players by pointing the direction you or other survivors are located
-Poor communication with emote's
- AFK killers to (Intentionally derank)
-Hackers which I've barely came across on

This should pretty much wrap it up there isn't any ground breaking things in this game such as glitches or other things that could potentially break the game some glitches here and there but other than that its really fun with friends but also very repetitive and addicting/
